premise_source_doc_sentence: Edward Scissorhands is a 1990 American romantic dark fantasy film directed by Tim Burton , produced by Denise Di Novi and Tim Burton , and written by Caroline Thompson from a story by Tim Burton and Caroline Thompson , starring Johnny Depp as an artificial man named Edward , an unfinished creation who has scissor blades instead of hands .

premise_source_doc_sentence: The Nightmare Before Christmas  (  also known as Tim Burton 's The Nightmare Before Christmas  )  is a 1993 American stop-motion animated dark fantasy musical film directed by Henry Selick , and produced and conceived by Tim Burton .
